text: Kevin Anthony Jance Nolan (born 24 June 1982) is an English former professional footballer and current first team coach for Premier League club West Ham United. He has represented England at under-21 level. ==Career statistics== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League FA Cup FA Cup League Cup League Cup Europe
